text: Ba'ze az onho ʙa suxani tu gus medihand, vale Mo ʙar dilhojason pardaho afkandaem, to onro darnajoʙand va gushojasonro vaznin kardaem. Va har mu'cizaero, ki ʙingarand, ʙa on imon nameovarand. Va cun nazdi tu ojand, ʙo tu ʙa munozara sar kunand. Kofiron megujand, ki inho cize cuz afsonahoi pesinijon nest
